. It is the capital of the
and is situated by the river Jaur.
It is situated on the N112/D612 from Béziers

This is a great centre for getting around the Monts de Lacaune, Le Sidobre and, nearest and possibly most appealing, the Monts d'Épinousse. Within the village the cathedral is well worth seeing - a mixture of Romanesque and Gothic styles, although it's date would not suggest Romanesque.
Try to look at the market early on a Friday and then get out into the country somewhere! The crowding is mind bending!
